1.0.name: wordpress/shopp-facebook-like-button-sflb
1.0.description: With this plugin installed you can supply your customers with the Facebook Like-button. The link provided on Facebook will redirect to the actual product page. When you use Open Graph Tags as well, an image and description will be displayed on Facebook.
